price: А кад би их видели, говорили би: „Ови су, заиста, у заблуди“,
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
